How to Play:

Game Instructions

Objective

Guess the secret 4-color code generated by the computer within 8 attempts.

Feedback System

How to Play

  1. Click on the color palette to select colors for your guess
  2. Fill all 4 positions in the current row
  3. Click "Submit Guess" to get feedback
  4. Use the feedback to refine your next guess
  5. Win by guessing the exact code within 8 attempts!
